sample

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreatureCard, SpellCard

    public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Card class: Contains: family it belongs to (rep or dem), name of the card, description, image URL and its cost, contains also a comparator and a function that renders the card's back
